K12D0537=D0870_H0494:30a-0: @30a / /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0537=D0870_H0494:30a-1: na mo ratna shi khi ne /
K12D0537=D0870_H0494:30a-3: aarha te samyaksam bud dh'a ya /
K12D0537=D0870_H0494:30a-5: ratne ratne ratne shi khi ne sv'ah'a /

K12D0537=D0870_H0494:30a-7: 'chi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skye'o //
